var render = function render() {

            ? _c(

                                  ),

                                    [
                                      annuncio.modalitaTransazione === "Vendita"
                                        ? _c(

                                            {

                                                [_vm._v(" prezzo proposto ")]
                                              ),

                                                _vm._v(

                                                        annuncio.prezzo
                                                      )
                                                    ) +
                                                    " "
                                                ),
                                              ]),
                                            ]
                                          )
                                        : annuncio.modalitaTransazione ===
                                          "Affitto"
                                        ? _c(
                                            "v-card",
                                            {
                                              staticClass: "mx-0",
                                              attrs: {

                                              },
                                            },

                                                [

                                                ]

                                                    ) +

                                                      )
                                                    ) +
                                                    " "
                                                ),
                                              ]),
                                            ]
                                          )
                                        : _vm._e(),
                                      _c(
                                        "v-card",
                                        [

                                            attrs: {

                                              color: "amber",
                                              dense: "",
                                              "half-increments": "",
                                              readonly: "",
                                              size: "14",
                                            },
                                          }),

                                            "div",

                                                  ")"
                                              ),
                                            ]
                                          ),

                            ],

var staticRenderFns = []

export { render, staticRenderFns }
